channel.title: Need Help Coding 634 Staffzone!
channel.description:
I have 2 problems:
1. I want to make it so that only moderators/admins are allowed in the staffzone.
Here's a reference for what my staffzone is already like
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OeHXf.png[/img]
2. I cannot move after I have teleported to my staffzone. I can noclip to move anywhere. When I log out outside of the box and log back in I cannot move inside past the perimiter of the box. Note- The original height was set at 0 which was underneath the cloud, so I set the height to 1.
Here's some clarification of what I mean: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LecB6Wc6kFY&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

item.title: Need Help Coding 634 Staffzone!
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

Server sided posted into client makes sense XD just edit the coords to make it spawn into the area were you can move freely

Read full topic

[/quote]

Can you please stop taking screenshots of the code, and actually putting it in code tags…

item.title: Need Help Coding 634 Staffzone!
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

It seems as if you can only NOT walk in the middle, so just change the cords that it teleports you to, to the outside of the middle, so they can walk

you staff command should look like this…

if (command[0].equals(“staffzone”) && (player.getRights() > *)) { Change * which admin player right…

I have 2 problems:

  1. I want to make it so that only moderators/admins are allowed in the staffzone.

Here’s a reference for what my staffzone is already like

  1. I cannot move after I have teleported to my staffzone. I can noclip to move anywhere. When I log out outside of the box and log back in I cannot move inside past the perimiter of the box.
    Note- The original height was set at 0 which was underneath the cloud, so I set the height to 1.
